picks.text: Apple announces a new Apple Silicon system-on-a-chip
picks.full-pick-text: Apple announces a new Apple Silicon system-on-a-chip

picks.text: The 13" MacBook Pro is redesigned
picks.full-pick-text: The 13" MacBook Pro is redesigned

picks.text: The MacBook Air is not updated at this event
picks.full-pick-text: The MacBook Air is not updated at this event

picks.text: The M1 iMac receives an update
picks.full-pick-text: The M1 iMac receives an update

picks.text: The names of the colours of the iMac are unchanged
picks.full-pick-text: The names of the colours of the iMac are unchanged
picks.notes: • Cleverly worded so that if the iMac isn't touched, the pick is still correct, but Federico's questioning of whether a change in hue counts causes Myke to water it down to just names. At the time of the pick, the colors were "Blue, Green, Pink, Silver, Yellow, Orange, Purple".

picks.text: The visual design of the 14" and 16" MacBook Pro is unchanged
picks.full-pick-text: The visual design of the 14" and 16" MacBook Pro is unchanged
picks.notes: • The word "visual" was added, but it's agreed that we'll know it when we see it.

picks.text: Apple unveils an iMac Pro
picks.full-pick-text: Apple unveils an iMac Pro
picks.notes: • In Stephen's mind, this requires a 27" or larger screen, and a Pro/Pro Max caliber processor at least.

picks.text: Apple unveils a new Studio Display Pro that is larger than the regular Studio Display and features a new screen technology than the smaller model
picks.full-pick-text: Apple unveils a new Studio Display Pro that is larger than the regular Studio Display and features a new screen technology than the smaller model
picks.notes: • Myke wavers on the "larger" clause but chooses to keep the pick unmodified when Stephen thinks it's important to the riskiness of the pick.

picks.text: Apple introduces a new desktop keyboard and/or trackpad that supports connecting to multiple devices at once. They also support USB-C connections now
picks.full-pick-text: Apple introduces a new desktop keyboard and/or trackpad that supports connecting to multiple devices at once. They also support USB-C connections now

picks.text: Johnny Srouji makes an appearance
picks.full-pick-text: Johnny Srouji makes an appearance

picks.text: The event video is less than 90 minutes long
picks.full-pick-text: The event video is less than 90 minutes long

picks.text: At least one M3-series chip introduces support for Thunderbolt 5, a first for the industry
picks.full-pick-text: At least one M3-series chip introduces support for Thunderbolt 5, a first for the industry

picks.text: Vision Pro is mentioned at some point during the video
picks.full-pick-text: Vision Pro is mentioned at some point during the video

picks.text: At least one computer or accessory that gets updated is less expensive in the US than before
picks.full-pick-text: At least one computer or accessory that gets updated is less expensive in the US than before

picks.text: Some kind of Halloween joke is made
picks.full-pick-text: Some kind of Halloween joke is made

picks.text: Someone says "carbon neutral"
picks.full-pick-text: Someone says "carbon neutral"

picks.text: All outside shots are filmed in the evening
picks.full-pick-text: All outside shots are filmed in the evening

picks.text: John Ternus looks great
picks.full-pick-text: John Ternus looks great
picks.notes: • How could this possibly be graded? Again, you'll know it when you see it.

picks.text: At least one Mac is available to order "today"
picks.full-pick-text: At least one Mac is available to order "today"

picks.text: We do not get new AirPods Max, even though I want them
picks.full-pick-text: We do not get new AirPods Max, even though I want them

picks.text: The iMac's input devices are updated with USB-C but otherwise remain the same
picks.full-pick-text: The iMac's input devices are updated with USB-C but otherwise remain the same

picks.text: The M3, M3 Pro and M3 Max are all announced
picks.full-pick-text: The M3, M3 Pro and M3 Max are all announced

picks.text: The Mac mini is not updated
picks.full-pick-text: The Mac mini is not updated

picks.text: The iPad isn't even mentioned
picks.full-pick-text: The iPad isn't even mentioned

picks.text: We don't see Tim Cook on video
picks.full-pick-text: We don't see Tim Cook on video
